shortDescription: Microsoft Windows Mark of the Web (MOTW) contains a security feature bypass vulnerability that allows an attacker to bypass MOTW-based defenses. This can result in a limited loss of integrity and availability of security features such as Protected View in Microsoft Office, which rely on MOTW tagging.
vulnerabilityName: Microsoft Windows Mark of the Web (MOTW) Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability
required_action: Apply mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if mitigations are unavailable.
